title: Alfonso Ribeiro to fill in for Tom Bergeron on 'DWTS'
text:
Alfonso Ribeiro; Tom Bergeron (Photo: Jon Kopaloff/FilmMagic; Angela Weiss/Getty Images)
CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Tom Bergeron will be absent from Monday's episode of Dancing With the Stars , but Alfonso Ribeiro will be there in his place.
The show's longtime host announced on Twitter on Sunday night that he wasn't going to be able to make it because he needs to spend time with his ailing father. "I'll miss 2morrow's #dwts to be at my Dad's bedside. He's given me a lifetime of support. Time to return the favor," wrote Bergeron alongside an old photo of himself and his father.
I'll miss 2morrow's #dwts to be at my Dad's bedside. He's given me a lifetime of support. Time to return the favor. pic.twitter.com/l8NmkFUSkC
— Tom Bergeron (@Tom_Bergeron) October 5, 2015 Not long after, Ribeiro announced he would be taking Bergeron's place. "I will be filling in for Tom Bergeron tomorrow night on Dancing With The Stars. I will be there with a heavy heart for my friend Tom and the Bergeron family," the Season 19 champion wrote on Facebook.
Meanwhile, Bergeron was en route to visit his dad. "I'm on a plane reading all of your lovely tweets which I'll share with my Dad. They are deeply appreciated. Thank you," he wrote on Twitter.
I'm on a plane reading all of your lovely tweets which I'll share with my Dad. They are deeply appreciated. Thank you.
